boardgame.name: Heroscape Master Set: Swarm of the Marro
boardgame.description: The second Master Set for the HeroScape series of games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Many different battlefields can be built by attaching and stacking the tiles. Each unit in the Master Set has a movement rating which is the number of hexes it can move in a turn. Moving up a level counts as a hex; moving down does not incur that penalty. Moving down more levels than your height when moving from one hex to another counts as falling and you might take damage - unless you are falling into water._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Combat in the game is fairly straightforward. You roll attack dice as listed on your unit's card under attack, and the opponent rolls defense dice equal to the defense number on their unit's card. Skulls rolled in excess of shields count as wounds. When the number of wounds equals the unit's life value, it is killed and removed from the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The master game uses a point system in which players alternate drafting cards until they reach the pre-assigned point value for the scenario. It's possible to bring a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;pre-fab_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; army to the battle in order to save time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is eminently customizable, with many expansions which add more abilities, terrain, and options. There are also user-created maps, scenarios, custom units and advanced rules available online._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For years the Marro have been summoned to Valhalla to expand the will of Utgar at all costs. But rumors are spreading that within the uncharted jungle there is an even greater menace waiting. A great Marro Hive, hidden deep within in the jungle swamps and treacherous rock is continuously spawning new savage predators. These creatures, said to be venomous Marro, perhaps even Hivelords, will emerge from their colony and contaminate the world. Includes 24 detailed miniature figures and 75 interlocking terrain pieces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This new Master Set includes everything you need to start your own adventures in the Heroscape world of Valhalla! There are 2 new Terrain Types: Swamp _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Swamp Water, as well as more Grass, Sand, Rock, and Water tiles to add to your existing Heroscape battlefields._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Also included in the set are 7 Unique Heroes, and 3 Common Marro Squads. However, the big news is the inclusion of the Marro Hive. The Hive has special powers directly relating to Common Marro Squad figures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2008 Golden Geek Best Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Nominee

Preferred: Local pickup only. ZIP 19002. Shipping is available, but the game will be wrapped rather than packaged in a box. The box may sustain damage in shipping, but many people store Heroscape in other containers anyway. Buyer pays actual shipping charges.
In Shrink Payment Australian buyers via direct deposit International buyers via paypal Will provide estimates for shipping

Wizards of the Coast - Heroscape Swarm of the Marro Language: English Weight: 1.930 kg New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Theme: For years, the Marro have been summoned to Valhalla. Now, rumors are spreading that within the uncharted jungle there is an even greater menace waiting. A great Marro Hive, hidden deep within in the jungle swamps and treacherous rock is continiously spawning new savage predators. These creatures, said to be venomous Marro, perhaps even Hivelords, will emerge from their colony and contaminate the world. Desperate to learn more, brave heroes from all worlds and eras embark into the darkness of the jungle... The battle of all time rages on as warriors and heroes are summoned to Valhalla to explore the uncharted jungle. This build-and-battle game system lets you create your battlefield with 75 customizable terrain pieces. The landscape is only limited by your imagination. Then, build your army with 24 different warriors, aliens, acid drones and stingers, each with their own strengths. Play the suggested scenarios, download more from www.heroscape.com or create your own. Contents: 24 painted figures, 75 Hex terrain pieces, a painted hive and base terrain piece, 16 order markers, 23 wound markers, 13 army cards, 13 combat dice, 8 Glyphs, 1 negotiation marker, 1 round marker, instructions with battlefield _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; scenario guide. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
